hero.title: Professionals Community
hero.subtitle: We unite clients and professionals from different serviceareas, creating a single space of trust and professionalism.Find a trusted specialist now:

socialNetwork.title: Is a platform of trusted specialists. A place where the best professionals and clients meet.We make finding a specialist simple, fast and safe.
socialNetwork.description: With us, you always choose professionals you can trust. Our priority is a transparent rating, honest reviews and guaranteed quality.

meetPeople.title: Platform advantages:
meetPeople.description: ✔ Verified specialists,✔ Real reviews and ratings,✔ Convenient search by category,✔ Support in Georgian, English and Russian,✔ Transparent payment system

forumDiscussion.title: Effective information
forumDiscussion.description: We publish hundreds of thousands of verified reviews about our specialists. We publish recommended prices for work, important tips, guides and training videos.

activeGroups.title: Support until the end of the work.
activeGroups.description: We attract only licensed and certified specialists to the site.We remove specialists from the site who do not comply with our terms of service and have low ratings from the clients.We will contact you to find out about the quality of the service received.Your feedback helps us and other clients use only the best services from the best craftsmen.We have a call center for quality service and for the dispute resolutions with professionals.

easierLife.title: How it works
easierLife.description: 1. The client searches for a master in the required category or leaves a request. 2. The master receives the order and contacts the client directly. 3. After the work is completed, the client evaluates the quality, leaves a review and helps other users make the right choice.

aboutView.title: Linking Professionals to Clients
aboutView.description1: Our innovative platform serves as a powerful bridge connecting highly skilled professionals with individuals and businesses in need of top-quality services. Whether you're a talented expert looking to showcase your abilities and expand your client base, or someone searching for dependable, vetted professionals to handle important tasks, we facilitate these valuable connections with ease and efficiency. Our comprehensive matching system ensures that every interaction is meaningful, productive, and mutually beneficial for all parties involved.
aboutView.description2: We're proud to host a thriving community of thousands of dedicated service providers who are successfully scaling their businesses and reaching new clients every day. At the same time, we help countless individuals and organizations find exactly the right professionals to meet their specific needs and exceed their expectations. By fostering trust, transparency, and collaboration, we're creating an ecosystem where service providers can flourish, clients can access exceptional help, and together we're building a dynamic, inclusive community that delivers real value to everyone who participates in it.

start-work.title: Start Working By Applying
start-work.description: Apply for a job and start working with us
